GOD.content: secret is an absolute relation w/out third party, “Here I am” (holy but not sacred)
GOD.linkedContent: secret is an absolute relation w/out third party, “Here I am” (holy but not sacred)

GOD.content: covenant remains absolutely singular in its election, if there’s no 3rd party, no hypothetical imperative, no generality of ethical, political, juridical
GOD.linkedContent: covenant remains absolutely singular in its election, if there’s no 3rd party, no hypothetical imperative, no generality of ethical, political, juridical

GT.content: credit, good faith, we lend each other in conversation; credit/faith as precomprehension that condition “tautology” of gift, and make gift impossible: “one” has to give some “thing” to someone other
GT.linkedContent: credit, good faith, we lend each other in conversation; credit/faith as precomprehension that condition “tautology” of gift, and make gift impossible: “one” has to give some “thing” to someone other

GT.content: poor man is third party (allows men to exchange, competition, capitalism) vs. woman [Irigaray]
GT.linkedContent: poor man is third party (allows men to exchange, competition, capitalism) vs. woman [Irigaray]

GT.content: [re: “Counterfeit Money”] only a liar could know whether friend gave real money, that is, a connoisseur of counterfeit money; so narrator believes, credits his friend
GT.linkedContent: [re: “Counterfeit Money”] only a liar could know whether friend gave real money, that is, a connoisseur of counterfeit money; so narrator believes, credits his friend

GT.content: literature as place of non-place of frame, triptych w/ dislocated frame, 3 + or – excluded 4th, all positions exchangeable to infinity, an ex-propriation that forbids a return to self, most powerful or interesting speculation
GT.linkedContent: literature as place of non-place of frame, triptych w/ dislocated frame, 3 + or – excluded 4th, all positions exchangeable to infinity, an ex-propriation that forbids a return to self, most powerful or interesting speculation

GT.content: readers are at once debtors & creditors, like the narrator, we are the beggar, the 3rd party excluded from the secret of the dual scene
GT.linkedContent: readers are at once debtors & creditors, like the narrator, we are the beggar, the 3rd party excluded from the secret of the dual scene

GT.content: [no depth beyond literary phenomenon] inviolability of secret depends on essential superficiality, bare device of being-two-to-speak (l’être-deux-à-parler), a secret beyond reserve of technique, thing, being, thing thought (same could be said for money)
GT.linkedContent: [no depth beyond literary phenomenon] inviolability of secret depends on essential superficiality, bare device of being-two-to-speak (l’être-deux-à-parler), a secret beyond reserve of technique, thing, being, thing thought (same could be said for money)

FL.content: “I cannot speak the language of the other except to the extent that I appropriate it and assimilate it according to the law (loi) of an implicit third…inasmuch as justice as law seems to imply an element of universality, the appeal to a third party who suspends the unilaterality or singularity of the idioms”
FL.linkedContent: “I cannot speak the language of the other except to the extent that I appropriate it and assimilate it according to the law (loi) of an implicit third…inasmuch as justice as law seems to imply an element of universality, the appeal to a third party who suspends the unilaterality or singularity of the idioms”

H.content: third person, justice, foreigner, Levinas’ “birth of the question”
H.linkedContent: third person, justice, foreigner, Levinas’ “birth of the question”

H.content: p. anne 78 “Here I am” of the guest is traumatizing
H.linkedContent: p. anne 78 “Here I am” of the guest is traumatizing

AF.content: Yerushalmi doesn’t treat Freud as a witness in the 3rd person (terstis), but as a 2nd person “called to witness” (incompatible w/ classical scientific discourse, history, philology)
AF.linkedContent: Yerushalmi doesn’t treat Freud as a witness in the 3rd person (terstis), but as a 2nd person “called to witness” (incompatible w/ classical scientific discourse, history, philology)

SPOM.content: Horatio, third party, witness for Hamlet’s father’s ghost
SPOM.linkedContent: Horatio, third party, witness for Hamlet’s father’s ghost

SPOM.content: self-manifestation of the manifesto, the “here I am” in the announcement of communism (Marx, Engels’ Manifesto)
SPOM.linkedContent: self-manifestation of the manifesto, the “here I am” in the announcement of communism (Marx, Engels’ Manifesto)

POOF.content: via Aristotle, the just wage (gage), a fee, salary, 3rd party & common measure—war ensues wherever common measure & straight and narrow path recoils (se dérobe) [translator also translates the Chapter Title, Replis,” as recoils] > in these grievances, where calculation becomes incalculable, where I can’t count on you, there is no friend
POOF.linkedContent: via Aristotle, the just wage (gage), a fee, salary, 3rd party & common measure—war ensues wherever common measure & straight and narrow path recoils (se dérobe) [translator also translates the Chapter Title, Replis,” as recoils] > in these grievances, where calculation becomes incalculable, where I can’t count on you, there is no friend

POOF.content: that either address [re: omega ω] is addressed to someone will always expose utterance to undecidability because address to ‘someone’ presupposes the impossible: 1) neutral gender 2) ‘only one’ someone > for one person to receive a mark once, the mark must multiply, its iterability affirms plus d’un (which allows & limits calculability), the 3rd party is there > there is never one, one is always more than one (w/ or w/out consent)
POOF.linkedContent: that either address [re: omega ω] is addressed to someone will always expose utterance to undecidability because address to ‘someone’ presupposes the impossible: 1) neutral gender 2) ‘only one’ someone > for one person to receive a mark once, the mark must multiply, its iterability affirms plus d’un (which allows & limits calculability), the 3rd party is there > there is never one, one is always more than one (w/ or w/out consent)

POOF.content: a few oddities that don’t surprise Kant: 1) no secrets in nature, secrets only there where there’s engagement, promise—and no one has the infinite intelligence to know for certain what the secret is 2) the impossible & necessary arithmetic returns: friendship as n + 1, plus d’un, there’s always one more than the 2 friends, a 3rd, so how can the secret be kept? 3) merely moral friendship is not just ideal, the event of friendship happens, the black swan
POOF.linkedContent: a few oddities that don’t surprise Kant: 1) no secrets in nature, secrets only there where there’s engagement, promise—and no one has the infinite intelligence to know for certain what the secret is 2) the impossible & necessary arithmetic returns: friendship as n + 1, plus d’un, there’s always one more than the 2 friends, a 3rd, so how can the secret be kept? 3) merely moral friendship is not just ideal, the event of friendship happens, the black swan

POOF.content: for Kant, the black swan of moral friendship is a brother [for Juvenal, p. 258, black swan was a woman]: bond btwn 2 men w/ necessary supplementary complication of a 3rd man
POOF.linkedContent: for Kant, the black swan of moral friendship is a brother [for Juvenal, p. 258, black swan was a woman]: bond btwn 2 men w/ necessary supplementary complication of a 3rd man

POOF.content: the 3rd witnesses a law that interrupts vertigo of singularity (a dual narcissism), 3rd opens up & keeps from closing the question of secrecy > Nietzsche: for the hermit, the friend is always 3rd person (keeps the other 2 [w/in oneself] from sinking to the depths)
POOF.linkedContent: the 3rd witnesses a law that interrupts vertigo of singularity (a dual narcissism), 3rd opens up & keeps from closing the question of secrecy > Nietzsche: for the hermit, the friend is always 3rd person (keeps the other 2 [w/in oneself] from sinking to the depths)

POO.content: innocent witness (testis), third (terstis), actor-participant, problematic (used as shield, supplement, “cover”) child, assume responsibility for another, passing oneself off as another [passion of Ulysses the oblique, Philoctetus]
POO.linkedContent: innocent witness (testis), third (terstis), actor-participant, problematic (used as shield, supplement, “cover”) child, assume responsibility for another, passing oneself off as another [passion of Ulysses the oblique, Philoctetus]

HASD.content: Plato’s use of “third species” as analogical mediation, concerns Being, epekeina tes ousias, and khora > khora also constitutes a third species (triton genos), isn't intelligible paradigm
HASD.linkedContent: Plato’s use of “third species” as analogical mediation, concerns Being, epekeina tes ousias, and khora > khora also constitutes a third species (triton genos), isn't intelligible paradigm

SEC.content: no code of writing is structurally secret, can always be iterable for a 3<sup><small>rd</small></sup> party
SEC.linkedContent: no code of writing is structurally secret, can always be iterable for a 3rd party

VM.content: for Levinas, when 3rd term [party] is light of Being (which is not being nor non-being while same and other are) > theoretical relation is ontology
VM.linkedContent: for Levinas, when 3rd term [party] is light of Being (which is not being nor non-being while same and other are) > theoretical relation is ontology

PAS.content: what i would like to give you: Viens w/out language overhang (sans aucun langage de surplomb), w/out anything that could name it, designate it from a third place
PAS.linkedContent: what i would like to give you: Viens w/out language overhang (sans aucun langage de surplomb), w/out anything that could name it, designate it from a third place

F.content: forums are politico-juridical instances: require a third; le for du dedans (not intérieur) is not le tribunal de la conscience (“jury box” of consciousness)
F.linkedContent: forums are politico-juridical instances: require a third; le for du dedans (not intérieur) is not le tribunal de la conscience (“jury box” of consciousness)

F.content: crypt must always incorporate more than one, plus d’un: cryptophore’s secret must be shared (partagé) w/ a “third,” that’s what makes a secret a secret
F.linkedContent: crypt must always incorporate more than one, plus d’un: cryptophore’s secret must be shared (partagé) w/ a “third,” that’s what makes a secret a secret

F.content: le tiers incorporé est gardé pour être supprimé [held in to be crossed out]: assembly of witnesses around Wolf Man’s crypt (forum): whole strategy of testifying > on s’y coupe tout le temps, witnesses testify by interrupting, wounded by angular edges of forum
F.linkedContent: le tiers incorporé est gardé pour être supprimé [held in to be crossed out]: assembly of witnesses around Wolf Man’s crypt (forum): whole strategy of testifying > on s’y coupe tout le temps, witnesses testify by interrupting, wounded by angular edges of forum

POS.content: Derrida’s undecidables, unities of simulacrum, “false” verbal properties that can’t be included in philosophical binary, but still inhabit it, resisting, disorganizing, w/out ever constituting a 3rd term, a solution: hymen, gram, incision, spacing, supplement, pharmakon, margin
POS.linkedContent: Derrida’s undecidables, unities of simulacrum, “false” verbal properties that can’t be included in philosophical binary, but still inhabit it, resisting, disorganizing, w/out ever constituting a 3rd term, a solution: hymen, gram, incision, spacing, supplement, pharmakon, margin

P.content: for Hegel, art as 3rd term gives reciprocity to artist & artwork, art is thus 1st term
P.linkedContent: for Hegel, art as 3rd term gives reciprocity to artist & artwork, art is thus 1st term

P.content: third party (ein Drittes) regulates encirclement, art can play this role, a medium, can touch both edges > ambiguity of participation can’t exhaust it [what if this 3rd doesn’t rèleve?]
P.linkedContent: third party (ein Drittes) regulates encirclement, art can play this role, a medium, can touch both edges > ambiguity of participation can’t exhaust it [what if this 3rd doesn’t rèleve?]

ROP.content: can there be a witness to madness, a third that provides reason w/out objectifying? w/out examining (arraisonner)? [Nietzsche’s no accusation, GS 276]
ROP.linkedContent: can there be a witness to madness, a third that provides reason w/out objectifying? w/out examining (arraisonner)? [Nietzsche’s no accusation, GS 276]

ATIA.content: suis of Qui/Que suis-je? (both être and suivre) the little third party as copula, comes btwn subject and itself, worries it (s’acharne), hounds it, to hunt itself in the mirror
ATIA.linkedContent: suis of Qui/Que suis-je? (both être and suivre) the little third party as copula, comes btwn subject and itself, worries it (s’acharne), hounds it, to hunt itself in the mirror

ATIA.content: why did Levinas never imagine the animal occupying place of the 3rd party, thus the 1st appeal to justice? > never an other other than the other human
ATIA.linkedContent: why did Levinas never imagine the animal occupying place of the 3rd party, thus the 1st appeal to justice? > never an other other than the other human

ATIA.content: Levinas’ 3rd party, an other of the other, in contrast to Lacan’s “there is no Other of the Other” > but, for both of them, what about the animal-other?
ATIA.linkedContent: Levinas’ 3rd party, an other of the other, in contrast to Lacan’s “there is no Other of the Other” > but, for both of them, what about the animal-other?

FS.content: God imprints secondarity on every navigation of the human: 1) passage of deferred reciprocity btwn reading & writing? 2) absolute witness who’s already read what you will write: third party as transparency of meaning? [circular logos]
FS.linkedContent: God imprints secondarity on every navigation of the human: 1) passage of deferred reciprocity btwn reading & writing? 2) absolute witness who’s already read what you will write: third party as transparency of meaning? [circular logos]

SW.content: “for they shall make a sanctuary, I shall dwell in their bosom” > veil, curtain, drape is dwelling of God, his ethos, this Who (that dwells) is also a What, a 3rd party, the Law, text of law
SW.linkedContent: “for they shall make a sanctuary, I shall dwell in their bosom” > veil, curtain, drape is dwelling of God, his ethos, this Who (that dwells) is also a What, a 3rd party, the Law, text of law

DPi.content: DP requires a third party, arbitrating authority foreign/superior to parties of dispute, a reason of state, a rationality, logos w/ universal claims > beyond individual passion/affect
DPi.linkedContent: DP requires a third party, arbitrating authority foreign/superior to parties of dispute, a reason of state, a rationality, logos w/ universal claims > beyond individual passion/affect

DPi.content: sovereign exception & DP > is state, third party, witness already there in singular, savage, secret crime, when murderer claims to do one’s own or to do oneself justice? where does murder begin?
DPi.linkedContent: sovereign exception & DP > is state, third party, witness already there in singular, savage, secret crime, when murderer claims to do one’s own or to do oneself justice? where does murder begin?

DPi.content: DP speaks in 3rd person present (can’t say: “I am no more”), copula signifies instantaneous passage from being to nothingness (“he is no more”): stigmē, Most High, Last Judgment, God’s verdict (always instant of death of a 3rd party, never me, you, us)
DPi.linkedContent: DP speaks in 3rd person present (can’t say: “I am no more”), copula signifies instantaneous passage from being to nothingness (“he is no more”): stigmē, Most High, Last Judgment, God’s verdict (always instant of death of a 3rd party, never me, you, us)

HST.content: border btwn ethical/political no longer insured: the 3rd (le tiers) gives birth to justice & finally state, 3rd announces himself in duel of the face-to-face, & the face: the beyond the state (condition of ethics) had to produce itself in the state
HST.linkedContent: border btwn ethical/political no longer insured: the 3rd (le tiers) gives birth to justice & finally state, 3rd announces himself in duel of the face-to-face, & the face: the beyond the state (condition of ethics) had to produce itself in the state

HST.content: this is a topological invagination: “outside produce[s] an enclave in the inside of the inside”
HST.linkedContent: this is a topological invagination: “outside produce[s] an enclave in the inside of the inside”

HST.content: the 3rd intrudes when 2 absolutes exchange place; the 3rd, question of justice, immediately betrays other’s finite-infinite singularity > thus: congenital perjury of justice
HST.linkedContent: the 3rd intrudes when 2 absolutes exchange place; the 3rd, question of justice, immediately betrays other’s finite-infinite singularity > thus: congenital perjury of justice

HST.content: X, great 3rd, God accords/grants forgiveness, renders substitution possible

LI.content: undecidability as third [?] remains heterogenous to dialectic/calculable, opens field of decision, decidability
LI.linkedContent: undecidability as third [?] remains heterogenous to dialectic/calculable, opens field of decision, decidability

TN.content: Levinas: lovers, dual solitude, excludes the third [triple solitude: each partner is solitary and so is the witness], the contrary of social relation > nothing attained, touched w/ caress
TN.linkedContent: Levinas: lovers, dual solitude, excludes the third [triple solitude: each partner is solitary and so is the witness], the contrary of social relation > nothing attained, touched w/ caress

TN.content: the 3rd, illeity of 3rd (not the 3rd man), begins justice, comes w/out waiting [w/out delay of differance?], affects face to face, but doesn’t interrupt the “welcome of the face”
TN.linkedContent: the 3rd, illeity of 3rd (not the 3rd man), begins justice, comes w/out waiting [w/out delay of differance?], affects face to face, but doesn’t interrupt the “welcome of the face”

TN.content: ineluctability (this is necessary) of the 3rd is law of question > question of a question, addressed to the other, from the other: the other of the other > a question that is certainly not first (comes after the yes of/to the other), though nothing precedes it
TN.linkedContent: ineluctability (this is necessary) of the 3rd is law of question > question of a question, addressed to the other, from the other: the other of the other > a question that is certainly not first (comes after the yes of/to the other), though nothing precedes it

TN.content: the “without question” at the birth of “first question” (the question is the 3rd): passage (w/out transition) from ethical responsibility to political, juridical, philosophical responsibility (the move out of immediacy)
TN.linkedContent: the “without question” at the birth of “first question” (the question is the 3rd): passage (w/out transition) from ethical responsibility to political, juridical, philosophical responsibility (the move out of immediacy)

TN.content: violence of pure face to face (hospitable welcome, narcissistic closing [renfermement]): in double bind w/ the 3rd (protects against vertigo of ethical violence while violating its purity)
TN.linkedContent: violence of pure face to face (hospitable welcome, narcissistic closing [renfermement]): in double bind w/ the 3rd (protects against vertigo of ethical violence while violating its purity)

TN.content: pure face to face as oath (serment) before the letter, debt before every contract or loan (emprunt), must perjure itself in bind w/ 3rd: in operation of justice can no longer distinguish btwn fidelity of oath & perjury of false witness
TN.linkedContent: pure face to face as oath (serment) before the letter, debt before every contract or loan (emprunt), must perjure itself in bind w/ 3rd: in operation of justice can no longer distinguish btwn fidelity of oath & perjury of false witness

TN.content: justice as law begins w/ perjury > violates; sigh of just man: “Qu’ai-je à faire avec la justice?”
TN.linkedContent: justice as law begins w/ perjury > violates; sigh of just man: “Qu’ai-je à faire avec la justice?”

TN.content: law of substitution, from substitution as law: the 3rd interrupts (distances) w/out interrupting (distancing)
TN.linkedContent: law of substitution, from substitution as law: the 3rd interrupts (distances) w/out interrupting (distancing)

TN.content: il, illeity, 3rd, “unrectitude”: certain rectitude would reduce its transcendence
Levinas compares his illeity to unimpeachable witness in Descartes’ 3rd Meditation
TN.linkedContent: Levinas compares his illeity to unimpeachable witness in Descartes’ 3rd Meditation

TN.content: “illeity,” sometimes designates interruption of face to face, sometimes very transcendence of the face in the face-to-face (a certain experience of “feminine alterity”): He (Il) in the depth of you
TN.linkedContent: “illeity,” sometimes designates interruption of face to face, sometimes very transcendence of the face in the face-to-face (a certain experience of “feminine alterity”): He (Il) in the depth of you

TN.content: “Torah before Sinai,” law before event, recognition of Torah by those for whom event of Sinai means nothing? a recognition by some 3rd, that would replace unique w/ unique? > a universal message in election of Israel (humanitarian hospitality uprooted from singularity of event, which becomes empirical, allegorical, “political” in restricted sense) [see p. 72]
TN.linkedContent: “Torah before Sinai,” law before event, recognition of Torah by those for whom event of Sinai means nothing? a recognition by some 3rd, that would replace unique w/ unique? > a universal message in election of Israel (humanitarian hospitality uprooted from singularity of event, which becomes empirical, allegorical, “political” in restricted sense) [see p. 72]

TN.content: for Kant & Levinas, brothers, irruption of equality, thus of the 3rd
TN.linkedContent: for Kant & Levinas, brothers, irruption of equality, thus of the 3rd

BSi.content: Kant’s distinction btwn conflict (Streit) & war (Krieg): an institution (3rd party) must know exactly what the accusation means [re: bêtise] for it to achieve rational status of conflict
BSi.linkedContent: Kant’s distinction btwn conflict (Streit) & war (Krieg): an institution (3rd party) must know exactly what the accusation means [re: bêtise] for it to achieve rational status of conflict

CF.content: forgiveness must engage 2 singularities: the guilty (perpetrator) & victim
CF.linkedContent: forgiveness must engage 2 singularities: the guilty (perpetrator) & victim

CF.content: amnesty, reconciliation, reparation when 3rd intervenes (no longer pure forgiveness)
CF.linkedContent: amnesty, reconciliation, reparation when 3rd intervenes (no longer pure forgiveness)

CF.content: the 3rd as survivor in general (institution, sociality, transgenerational heritage)
CF.linkedContent: the 3rd as survivor in general (institution, sociality, transgenerational heritage)

OG.content: w/ 2 supplements (writing, onanism), auto-affection manifests by leaving a trace of itself in the world, exteriority of space, touchant-touché admits the world as 3rd party, here jouissance and se-donner-une-présence welcome the other in small difference separating l’agir du pâtir (doing from suffering)
OG.linkedContent: w/ 2 supplements (writing, onanism), auto-affection manifests by leaving a trace of itself in the world, exteriority of space, touchant-touché admits the world as 3rd party, here jouissance and se-donner-une-présence welcome the other in small difference separating l’agir du pâtir (doing from suffering)

SPEC.content: each time one of [3] “terms” [2 principles +/– differance] goes to the end (va au-bout) of itself, of its other, w/out 3rd party, it is death (l’entorse mortelle qui met fin au retors du calcul)
SPEC.linkedContent: each time one of [3] “terms” [2 principles +/– differance] goes to the end (va au-bout) of itself, of its other, w/out 3rd party, it is death (l’entorse mortelle qui met fin au retors du calcul)
